CONVERSATION GROUP: Well, I can fix just about anything! Broken horse shoe, melted pot, jammed door lock.... oh, and weapons and armor, too!
Well... not really. I don't have any materials. BUT... if you bring me any broken item, I can fix it right up! Heck, I can even make some items BETTER by combining it with something else.
Well, just let me take a look through your bags and I'll let you know.
Please keep this as a separate section, as I'll need to come back here often to add new items and the list is only going to get longer and longer...
Hm... nope, I don't see anything I can do for ya. Come back to me in the future if you ever find something interesting and useless!
Amazing! You have all the parts for the Bow of Hungering! It's a devilish bow... I can put it back together for you, if you like!
Hm... I think you've got part of a shield here, but no way I can put it together without all of the parts.
Can you check if you can make anything else?
BK cut " and let you into whatever door it opens"
Hitwoman Dagger - See Hitwomen_SQ for the quest that drops these

Well I'll be... you have all the pieces of the famed gagger of the Solar'el Clan. I can reforge this for you if you'd like.
